controlled_vocabulary.comment: Referred to in the Array Layout Spots table and used to describe the medium on which the the probe is deposited

term.name: glass_slide
term.description: user sequence features are spotted on a rigid silicon-based support medium

term.name: nylon_membrane
term.description: user sequence features are spotted on a nylon-coated flexible medium

term.name: nitrocellulose
term.description: user sequence features are spotted on a nitrocellulose medium

term.name: gel_sieve
term.description: target sequence features are separated through a size sieving procedure

term.name: mag_bead
term.description: target sequence features are separated by magnetic bead attachment

term.name: sequence_instance
term.description: target sequence features are sequenced fragments whose frequency of occurrence is recorded
